anyOf.description: The armor that an entity is wearing.
The cape that a player might have.
The collar of a tamed Cat.
The mouse ears that the official Deadmau5 account has on its head.
The item the Dolphin is holding in their mouth when playing with the said item.
The outer layer of the Drowned's texture (clothes, vegetation, etc.).
The elytra on the back of an entity. Also works for elytras from the Elytra Flight (Power Type).
The block an Enderman is holding.
The animated swirling texture that appears on (charged) a Creeper and Wither Boss (at half health).
The glow-in-the-dark eyes of a Spider, Cave Spider and Enderman.
The item that a Fox is holding in their mouth.
The non-armor item in an entity's head armor slot.
The item a humanoid entity is holding in their hands.
The armor a Horse is wearing.
The patterns of a Horse.
The cracks that appears when an Iron Golem is damaged.
The flowers that appears on an Iron Golem.
The decorations that appears when a Llama is wearing a certain carpet.
The mushrooms on top of a Mooshroom.
The item that a Panda is holding.
The saddle that appears when a Pig is wearing a saddle.
The wool coat of a Sheep.
The Parrots perching on a player.
The head of a Shulker.
The translucent part of a Slime.
The pumpkin of a Snow Golem.
The teared clothing of a Stray.
The objects that can get stuck to a player, like Arrows or Bee Stingers.
The animated swirling texture that appears when a player uses a Trident that has the Riptide enchantment.
The pattern on top of a Tropical Fish's base color.
The clothes of a Villager.
The item that a Villager is holding.
The collar of a tamed Wolf.
